entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kitchener-Waterloo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:56 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Region of Waterloo Int'l Airport 01:50 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
